p: The interaction between influenza virus infection and the host anti-viral response has been investigated in depth [ 15, 16], and the regulatory mechanism of IBV infection is also under investigation. Previous research has already shown that IBV ribonucleoprotein rapidly activates TLR signaling pathways [ 14]. Nevertheless, the overall circumstances of the innate immune response, the pathways and types of IFNs that are dominant in innate immunity against IBV infection, and how they are regulated remain unclear.
